description: Material : Polyester 70%, Viscose 28%, Elastane 2%, Cotton 9%, Key Features of Suit trousers : Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases,woven fabric with a zip fly and waistband with a button and hook-and-eye fastener, ideal for : men, Color: Brown.
